page.title: 14LIFE STYLE BURY FASHION
page.content: MOST PEOPLE IN THE BURY AREA GO TO PETERBOROUGH FOR THEIR CLOTHES.THE SHOPS THE GIRLS GO TO ARE RHAPSODY,TOPSHOP,CHELSEA GIRL AND DOROTHY PERKINS.THE BOYS MAINLY GO TO COLLIER,TOP MAN AND BURTONS.MOST PEOPLE DO FEEL COMFORTABLE IN FASHION CLOTHES BUT WOULD NOT WEAR CLOTHES THAT THEY DO NOT LIKE IF THEY CAME IN FASHION.MOST PEOPLE WEAR JEANS AND T-SHIRTS TO RELAX IN.MOST OF THE PEOPLE WEAR FASHION CLOTHES BECAUSE PEOPLE MAKE FUN OF THEM IF THEY DO NOT.SKIN TIGHT JEANS (NICKNAMED SPRAY ON JEANS) HAVE BEEN IN FASHION FOR ABOUT TWO YEARS,AND THE FLOWERY SHIRTS AND TROUSERS ARE NOW COMING IN FASHION.THE BOYS WEAR TIGHT JEANS AND T-SHIRTS OR BAGGY JEANS /TROUSERS WITH A T-SHIRT OR JUMPER.
